name: Format
description:
Consider:
  • Face-to-face - participants are required to attend on-site teaching sessions
  • Online - participants are required to complete online teaching sessions
  • Blended - participants are required to attend on-site and online teaching sessions
  • Hybrid - participants can choose to attend on-site or online teaching sessions

name: Scheduling
description:
Consider:
  • Scheduled - participants are required to attend at a specific time
  • Unscheduled - participants can attend at their own pace

name: WAI Curricula module
description: WAI Curricula on Web Accessibility is a framework to help you create courses on digital accessibility, or to include accessibility in other courses. WAI Curricula provides a set of learning outcomes, topics and assessment ideas covering accessibility foundations that apply broadly, and specific skills for developers, designers and content authors. See more information about WAI Curricula Modules.
